encoding.description: Encoding of audio data which will be sent.

sampleRateHertz.description: Sample rate in Hertz of the audio data which will be sent.

chunkLengthMs.description: Duration in ms of the chunks of audio data which will be sent.

dev.description: If `true`, then no real captioner will be triggered. A :code:`ready` event will be sent in the websocket between :code:`2` and :code:`5` seconds after the connection initialization, and the following transcripts will be ASR only.

language.description: Language of the conversation (french by default).

groundTruth.description: The ground truth of the text associated to the audio. If provided, the server will return a WER score
